column4: alright when ssh-ing, I'm running my bot on another server, which I ssh-ed to. However, how do i log out of the ssh session without closing the bot?
append an "&" at the end of the command, and it will be sent to background
will i get feed to the terminal?
the program prints debugging info and stuffs
you can also send the feed to a file, using >
ok, ummm setting it as a background thing doesn't help when i close the terminal
when i add & immediately after the program
python craybott.py&     is the command i used
i just verifed this method over ssh. it works
